description: Despite the name of this restaurant, its owners are actually called Renato and Sergio! Housed in a small country villa with the ambience of an elegant private residence, the restaurant boasts a dining room with a welcoming fireplace and a veranda full of natural light. The cuisine is modern yet decidedly Italian in influence.
